revised_title: Development and Structure of the Skull in the Common Fowl
tldr: This article describes the step-by-step development of the skull, face, and sense-capsules of the common fowl from the fourth day of incubation to extreme old age. The author provides a detailed analysis of the skull structure and its relation to other vertebrates, focusing on the differences in cartilage formation and ossification processes in various bird species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Anatomy
